饁字的基本解释

饁
yè
见“馌”。

饁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yè］
［《廣韻》筠輒切，入葉，云。］
“馌1”的繁体字。
(1)往田野送饭。
(2)泛指馈食。
(3)古代田猎时以猎获物祭四郊之神。参见“饁獸”。

饁字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　饁； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1424第12
【唐韻】筠輒切【集韻】域輒切【正韻】弋涉切，?音葉。【玉篇】餉田食。【爾雅·釋詁】饁，鑲饋也。【疏】野饋曰饁。【詩·豳風】饁彼南畝。【左傳·僖三十三年】臼季使過冀，見冀缺耨，其妻饁之。　又【周禮·夏官·大司馬】致禽饁獸於郊。【註】聚所獲禽，因以祭四方之神於郊也。　又【集韻】乙業切，音腌。野饋也。

考證：〔【周禮·春官·小宗伯】致禽饁獸於郊。〕　謹照原文春官小宗伯改夏官大司馬。

Basic explanation of words
Fu
yè

Fu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yè］
["Guangyun" Jun cuts into the leaves, clouds. ]
Traditional characters for "馌1".
(1) Deliver food to the field.
(2) Generally refers to feeding.
(3) In ancient times, hunting was used to sacrifice the gods of the suburbs. See "Fu Beast".
Fu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Shizi Department】　馌; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1424-12
[Tang Yun] Jun 辄切 [Ji Yun] Domain 辄切 [Zheng Rhyme] Yi She cut,? Yin Ye. 【Jade articles】Tian Shi. 【Erya·Shigu】Fu, inlay and feed. 【Sparse】Yeshou said Fu. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Fu Bi Nanmu. [Thirty-three Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xi] Jiu Ji envoys to Ji, and sees Ji Quexu and his wife Fu Zhi.　[Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Da Sima] To the beasts in the suburbs. [Note] The poultry obtained in the gathering is for offering sacrifices to the gods of the Quartet in the suburbs.　[Jiyun] Yiye cut, sound pickled. Wild feed also. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Chunguan·Xiao Zongbo] To the beasts of poultry and beasts in the suburbs. 〕 　 I would like to change the official Chunguan Xiao Zongbo to Xia Guan Da Sima according to the original text.
